CustomField.description: The Payee and Payment Entity on the creation of an Assignment will be set from the Contact's Primary Payee record. If unchecked the Payment Entity on the Assignment will be set from the Default Payment Entity on the Agreement and a Payee with a matching Payment Entity must exist for the integration to succeed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Payee and Payment Entity on the creation of an Assignment will be set from the Contact's Primary Payee record. If unchecked the Payment Entity on the Assignment will be set from the Default Payment Entity on the Agreement and a Payee with a matching Payment Entity must exist for the integration to succeed.
CustomField.label: Assignment Primary Payee
